Wisdom: الْخَوْفُ مِنَ اللَّهِ فِي الدُّنْيَا يُؤْمِنُ الْخَوْفَ فِي الْآخِرَةِ مِنْهُ
enWisdom: Fear of Allah in this world makes one safe from fear of Him in the Hereafter
The fruit of fear is security
Fear [Allah] and you will be safe, and do not [wait to] be safe so that you may fear [Him]

Wisdom: خَفِ اللَّهَ خَوْفَ مَنْ شَغَلَ بِالْفِكْرِ قَلْبَهُ فَإِنَّ الْخَوْفَ مَظَنَّةُ [مَطِيَّةُ] الْأَمْنِ وَسِجْنُ النَّفْسِ عَنِ الْمَعَاصِي
enWisdom: Fear Allah with the fearing of one who busies his mind with contemplation, for indeed fear [of Allah] is the best place to find security and is a restraint for the self from vices
Fear of Allah brings security for the one who is filled with it

Wisdom: خَفِ اللَّهَ يُؤْمِنْكَ وَلَا تَأْمَنْهُ فَيُعَذِّبَكَ
enWisdom: Fear Allah and He will protect you, and do not feel safe from Him [to the extent that you begin committing sins] so that He punishes you

Wisdom: فَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ عِبَادَ اللَّهِ تَقِيَّةَ مَنْ شَغَلَ بِالْفِكْرِ قَلْبَهُ وَأَوْجَفَ الذِّكْرَ بِلِسَانِهِ وَقَدَّمَ الْخَوْفَ لِأَمَانِهِ
enWisdom: So be wary of [your duty towards] Allah, O servants of Allah, with the God-wariness of one who has preoccupied his heart with reflection, who [always] has the remembrance [of Allah] on his tongue and who advances [good deeds out of] fear for his safety [in the Hereafter]
Whoever fears Allah, his [other] fears are reduced

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يَصْدُقْ مِنَ اللَّهِ خَوْفُهُ لَمْ يَنَلْ مِنْهُ الْأَمَانَ [مِنْهُ الْآمَالَ‏]
enWisdom: One who does not truly fear Allah will not gain His security

Wisdom: مَنْ خَافَ اللَّهَ آمَنَهُ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ مِنْ كُلِّ شَيْ‏ءٍ
enWisdom: One who fears Allah is protected by Allah, the Glorified, from everything

Wisdom: مَنْ خَافَ النَّاسَ أَخَافَهُ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ مِنْ كُلِّ شَيْ‏ءٍ
enWisdom: One who fears the people, Allah, the Glorified, makes him afraid of everything
The best means of [arriving at] security is fear [of Allah]
